title: Research is in our DNA
desc1: Shoolini is at the forefront of research  internationally, and and attracts outstanding academics, research staff and students from across the globe. Shoolini researchers engage in leading-edge research across disciplines and make ground-breaking contributions in science, engineering, business, and liberal arts. Our researchers are tackling key global challenges from finding cures to diseases to ecological problems  to agriculture and myriad other issues. Our world-class resources include state-of-the art research facilities, extensive grant and funding opportunities, robust support networks dedicated to turning research into actionable inovations. We are committed to supporting our inspiring community of researchers break new grounds and expand the frontiers of knowledge to help improve the human condition and the state of our planet,
